2 Chapter 1 2.1 Stem and leaf plot (1.2) 2.2 Frequency histogram (1.2) 2.3 Density histogram (1.2) 2.4 Measures of location (1.3) 2.5 Measures of variability (1.4) 2.6 Boxplots (1.4)

2 Chapter 1 2.1 Stem and leaf plot (1.2) prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) stem(prices) ## ## The decimal point is 2 digit(s) to the right of the | ## ## 3 | 8 ## 4 | 355 ## 5 | 03445 ## 6 | 078 ## 7 | 00335 ## 8 | 0 2.2 Frequency histogram (1.2) prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) hist(prices) hist(prices, breaks = c(300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800), col = "lightblue") 2.3 Density histogram (1.2) prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) hist(prices, freq = FALSE, breaks = c(300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800), col = "lightblue", las = 1) 2.4 Measures of location (1.3) prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) mean(prices) ## [1] 593.2222 median(prices) ## [1] 572 ## quartiles quantile(prices) ## 0% 25% 50% 75% 100% ## 379.0 506.5 572.0 699.0 799.0 ## trimmed mean mean(prices, trim = .1) ## 10% trimmed mean ## [1] 593.75 2.5 Measures of variability (1.4) Sample variance prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) var(prices) ## [1] 15981.48 Sample standard deviation sqrt(var(prices)) ## [1] 126.4179 sd(prices) ## [1] 126.4179 Five number summary (min, lower-hinge, median, upper-hinge, max) fivenum(prices) ## [1] 379 499 572 699 799 2.6 Boxplots (1.4) prices <- c(379, 425, 450, 450, 499, 529, 535, 535, 545, 599, 665, 675, 699, 699, 725, 725, 745, 799) boxplot(prices) boxplot(prices, horizontal = TRUE) PTSD <- c(10, 20, 25, 28, 31, 35, 37, 38, 38, 39, 39, 42, 46) Healthy <- c(23, 39, 40, 41, 43, 47, 51, 58, 63, 66, 67, 69, 72) df <- data.frame(Healthy, PTSD) boxplot(df, horizontal = TRUE)
